llm_reason: Cust and NBIM have different FX rates, indicating a reconciliation break.
llm_action: Investigate FX rate discrepancy and verify source data.
standard_step: Compare NBIM vs custodian FX source & timestamp; check cross-currency reversal flag; reprice if stale.
